name: Charm Tale
description: Explore a fantastic world and see an enchanting story come to life in this exceptional puzzler!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: AMD Atholon 64 X2 Dual-Core 4000+ or better / Intel Core 2 Duo Processor 2.0GHz or better Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: ATI X1800 or better / nVidia 7800 or better / Intel 4100 or better. 512MB Video RAM Storage: 20 MB available space
